title: Expose
instruction: Click each item to remove the front cover and display the content underneath. Clicking again will restore the item to its original state.

back.title: Titles are optional
back.body: You can have text or images as content and can pick from a range of different animations

back.title: Default Settings
back.body: By default the front cover will display a question mark and will fade out when clicked

back.title: This is the "shrink" animation
back.body: You can also choose various slide and flip animations. Click the link below to find out more
